document.full_text: a federal grand jury has returned an 18-count indictment against a missouri couple accused of torturing a mentally impaired teenage girl in live webcasts while she was kept a virtual prisoner and sex slave in their trailer home.
document.title: new charges brought in missouri online sex torture case
lines_and_colors: a federal grand jury has returned an 18-count indictment against a missouri couple accused of torturing a mentally impaired teenage girl in live webcasts while she was kept a virtual prisoner and sex slave in their trailer home.
